interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/05/25 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', 'Українська', 'Tiếng Việt', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Steven Conrad'], 'Producers': ['Glenn Ficarra', 'John Requa', 'Jennifer Scher', 'Charles Gogolak', 'Christina Fitzgerald', 'Bruce Terris', 'Michael Nelson', 'Peter Moxley', 'James Parriott', 'Gil Bellows', 'Stephen Hoey'], 'Starring': ['Chris Conrad', 'Kurtwood Smith', 'Michael Dorman'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: How is it that I just heard about this show? Its everything I want.
Its beautiful music, directing, and acting. All of the actors are perfection.
Its hard to describe - but its a Must watch. As someone who votes - I'm surprised it hasn't gotten more awards.
It doesn't have to rely on anything grotesque or sexually subversive to achieve its humor.
Dark comedy at its best. Review Title: Spectacular in Every Way! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Sidekicks: A Dreamer and a Champion VHS Jonathan Brandis, Joe Piscopo, Chuck Norris, Mako, Beau Bridges (Actor) Rated: PG Format: VHS Tape Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.13 Ounces', 'Run time': '1 hour and 40 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 9, 2000', 'Date First Available': 'February 24, 2006', 'Actors': 'Jonathan Brandis, Joe Piscopo, Chuck Norris, Mako, Beau Bridges'} OK - so you have an ADHD kid who zones out into day dreams about Chuck Norris!

What could be better?

As hilarious as I remembered it to be.

The real question is why hasn't this cult classic come out on DVD? Phenomenal.... I mean - come on?! {'Content advisory': ['Foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Theodore Melfi'], 'Producers': ['Donna Gigliotti', 'Peter Chernin', 'Jenno Topping', 'Pharrell Williams', 'Theodore Melfi'], 'Starring': ['Taraji P. Henson', 'Janelle Monae', 'Kevin Costner']} This movie rocks.... from start to finish!!
Girl Power at its best.
... and who knew how gorgeous Janelle Monae is and how she holds the screen. Girl Power at its best.. {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Kelly'], 'Starring': ['Caitríona Balfe', 'Sam Heughan', 'Gary Lewis'], 'Studio': ['starz_svod']} Extremely (and I mean extremely) VIOLENT.

Such an interesting story. Why ruin it with such horror?

I just dont need those images in my brain. Extremely (and I mean extremely) VIOLENT. Such an interesting ... {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español', 'Português', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español', 'Français', 'Português'], 'Directors': ['Mark Schwahn'], 'Starring': ['Alexandra Park', 'Tom Austen', 'Elizabeth Hurley'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']} Tv rubbish at its best!! & with an amazing sound track. Liz Hurley kills it and excellent casting all the way - including the Aussie actress who plays the princess. Her accent from down under peaks through from time to time - but she's so fun to watch.
Warning - addictive and binge worthy. Tv rubbish at its best!! & with an amazing sound track {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Mark Schwahn'], 'Producers': ['Mark Schwahn', 'Brian Robbins', 'Joe Davola', 'Shuana Phelan'], 'Starring': ['Alexandra Park', 'Vincent Regan', 'Merritt Patterson']} The most entertaining, hilarious, eye-candy that will pull you in from the first moment. Hurley delivers an unexpected twist on the notion of the queen. Excellent casting all around. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Media Enthusiast:** The user remains passionate about movies and TV shows, especially those with cult status and unique storytelling elements. They appreciate contemporary works that resonate with powerful themes while becoming increasingly sensitive to graphic content that distracts from narrative quality.

- **Nostalgia Driven:** Values content that evokes nostalgia, favoring classics from the late '90s and early 2000s and enjoying nostalgic formats like VHS.

- **Comedy and Empowerment Appreciation:** Enjoys humorous content, particularly dark comedies that combine humor with themes of empowerment and representation. Their recent review emphasized a preference for shows that achieve humor without relying on grotesque or sexually subversive elements, highlighting a discerning taste for storytelling quality.

- **Family Considerations:** Reflects on media from a child’s viewpoint, prioritizing family-friendly content suitable for younger audiences.

- **Frustration with Discontinuation:** Concerned about the availability of older media formats, expressing a desire for easier access to nostalgic classics.

- **Critical Engagement:** Willing to provide high ratings for content with addictive storytelling, strong casting, and engaging soundtracks. They value the combination of humor and depth, as seen in their recent review praising excellent directing and performances, particularly appreciating content that avoids relying on sensationalism to deliver its message.

Overall, the user leans towards nostalgic, family-oriented, and comedic films featuring memorable characters and important social themes, while being increasingly selective about content that lacks substance.
